attributes.action: Allow MP's too earn no more than the average wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's constantly dictate to us all about how we should live our lives, They should live by they're own  example. If they believe that the taxes are fair then they should suffer them fully and be allowed to spend no more than the average wage per annum. All extra income should be free for public scrutiny.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
